long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Mega Match is a modern puzzle version of the traditional game тАЬMemoryтАЭ where you must remember where various tiles are placed on the board. WeтАЩve added some bells, whistles, and microsecond timers to make Mega Match more stimulating and fun to play. 

Score tracking allows friendly competition with family and friends, or you can play on your own to accumulate points and prepare for the upcoming Competition Mode. 

And Mega Match is absolutely free to play! 

No login is required. Optional in-game purchases are planned for the future, but you will always be able to play Mega Match for free by yourself or with friends and family.

Mega Match is designed to improve your mental focus and visual recognition skills using concepts like colors, time, language, and shapes to stimulate your short term memory recall ability. Yes, playing Mega Match may actually improve your short term memory skills.

- MEGA MATCH FEATURES  -

ЁЯМИ Family-Friendly Content тАУ no explicit content. WeтАЩre Grandma-approved!
тнР Fun for all ages тАУ even Grandma loves beating your Mega Match score
тнР 20+ tile sets тАУ more on the way so Grams can play with her kitties but you donтАЩt have to
ЁЯЪА Fast Games тАУ most levels are completed in under a minute, perfect for short breaks to re-focus your brain
ЁЯЖУ Free to Play тАУ we show you a few affiliate offers instead of charging you money
тнР Play Offline тАУ play in the car or on the airplane!
ЁЯза Improves Memory тАУ concentration, focus, recall, recognition
ЁЯС╢ Easy to Play тАУ 5 difficulty levels ensures achievement resolution
ЁЯе╖ Hard to Play тАУ 5 difficulty levels ensures challenge accuracy
тнР Learn numbers 1-12 in Spanish тАУ More language learning tiles are planned
тнР Learn numbers 1-12 in English тАУ More language learning tiles are planned
тнР Scoreboard тАУ impress your friends, or else take selfies of your new 2x or 3x brain size 
тнР Full Credits are available from the in-game menu
ЁЯд║ 2025 Update Roadmap includes Competition Mode

Install Mega Match now from the Chrome Web Store!

- NOTICES - 
Mega Match is Copyright 2024 Ben Bird. All Rights Reserved
Mega Match is a trademark of Ben Bird.
Mega Match is Made in the U.S.A. with love!
long.es:
Un juego gratuito dise├▒ado para mantener la mente, desarrollar la concentraci├│n mental, mejorar la capacidad de la memoria y promover el bienestar. ┬бDiversi├│n para todas las edades!

El juego Mega Match es una versi├│n moderna del tradicional juego тАЬMemoriaтАЭ en el que debes recordar d├│nde se colocan varias fichas en el tablero. Hemos agregado algunas campanas, silbidos y temporizadores de microsegundos para que Mega Match sea m├бs estimulante y divertido de jugar. 

El seguimiento de la puntuaci├│n te permite competir amistosamente con familiares y amigos, o puedes jugar solo para acumular puntos y prepararte para el pr├│ximo modo Competici├│n. ┬бDiversi├│n familiar para todas las edades! 

┬бY jugar a Mega Match es absolutamente gratis! 

No es necesario iniciar sesi├│n. Se planean compras opcionales dentro del juego para el futuro, pero siempre podr├бs jugar Mega Match gratis solo o con amigos y familiares.

Mega Match est├б dise├▒ado para mejorar su concentraci├│n mental y sus habilidades de reconocimiento visual utilizando conceptos como colores, tiempo, lenguaje y formas para estimular su capacidad de recordar la memoria a corto plazo. S├н, jugar Mega Match puede mejorar tus habilidades de memoria a corto plazo. ┬бT├│mate un descanso para volver a centrar tu cerebro!

Sea inteligente con Mega Match

- MEGA MATCH RASGOS  -

ЁЯЖУ  Gratis para jugar
ЁЯМИ Contenido apto para familias: sin contenido expl├нcito. ┬бEstamos aprobados por la abuela!
тнР Para todas las edades: incluso a la abuela le encanta superar tu puntuaci├│n en Mega Match
тнР M├бs de 20 conjuntos de fichas: m├бs en camino para que la abuela pueda jugar con sus gatitos, pero t├║ no tienes que hacerlo
ЁЯЪА Juegos r├бpidos: la mayor├нa de los acertijos se completan en menos de 2 minutos. 
тнР Juega sin conexi├│n: ┬бjuega en el auto, en el autob├║s o en el avi├│n!
ЁЯза Mejora la memoria: concentraci├│n, atenci├│n, recuerdo, reconocimiento.
ЁЯС╢ F├бcil de jugar: 5 niveles de dificultad garantizan la resoluci├│n de logros
ЁЯе╖ Dif├нcil de jugar: 5 niveles de dificultad garantizan la precisi├│n del desaf├нo
тнР Aprenda los n├║meros del 1 al 12 en ingl├йs: se planean m├бs mosaicos de aprendizaje de idiomas
тнР Marcador: impresiona a tus amigos o t├│mate selfies con tu cerebro m├бs grande 
ЁЯд║ La hoja de ruta de la actualizaci├│n 2025 incluye el modo Competici├│n


- NOTAS - 
Mega Match is Copyright 2024. Ben Bird All Rights Reserved.
Reservados todos los derechos

long.fr:
Le jeu Mega Match est une version moderne du jeu traditionnel ┬л Memory ┬╗ dans lequel vous devez vous rappeler o├╣ les diff├йrentes tuiles sont plac├йes sur le plateau. Le suivi des scores permet une comp├йtition amicale avec votre famille et vos amis, ou vous pouvez jouer seul pour accumuler des points et vous pr├йparer au prochain mode Comp├йtition. 

Et Mega Match est absolument gratuit ! Aucune connexion n'est requise. Des achats optionnels dans le jeu sont pr├йvus ├а l'avenir, mais vous pourrez toujours jouer gratuitement ├а Mega Match seul ou avec vos amis et votre famille.

Le jeu de m├йmoire Mega Match est un plaisir familial pour tous les ├вges !

Mega Match est con├зu pour am├йliorer votre concentration mentale et vos capacit├йs de reconnaissance visuelle en utilisant des concepts tels que les couleurs, le temps, le langage et les formes pour stimuler votre capacit├й de rappel de m├йmoire ├а court terme. Oui, jouer ├а Mega Match peut r├йellement am├йliorer vos capacit├йs de m├йmoire ├а court terme.

- CARACT├ЙRISTIQUES DU M├ЙGA MATCH -

ЁЯМИ Contenu familial тАУ Nous sommes approuv├йs par grand-m├иre !
тнР Amusant pour tous les ├вges тАУ m├кme grand-m├иre adore battre votre score Mega Match
тнР Plus de 20 jeux de tuiles тАУ dтАЩautres sont en route pour que grand-m├иre puisse jouer avec ses chatons
ЁЯЪА Jeux rapides тАУ la plupart des niveaux sont termin├йs en moins d'une minute
ЁЯЖУ Jouer gratuitement

long.vi:
The Mega Match game is a modern version of the traditional game тАЬMemoryтАЭ where you must remember where various tiles are placed on the board. WeтАЩve added some bells, whistles, and microsecond timers to make Mega Match more stimulating and fun to play. Score tracking allows friendly competition with family and friends, or you can play on your own to accumulate points and prepare for the upcoming Competition Mode. Family-friendly fun for all ages! 

And Mega Match is absolutely free to play! 

No login is required. Optional in-game purchases are planned for the future, but you will always be able to play Mega Match for free by yourself or with friends and family.

Mega Match is designed to improve your mental focus and visual recognition skills using concepts like colors, time, language, and shapes to stimulate your short term memory recall ability. Yes, playing Mega Match may actually improve your short term memory skills.

- MEGA MATCH FEATURES  -

    тАв Family-Friendly Content тАУ no explicit or threatening content. WeтАЩre Grandma-approved!
    тАв Fun for all ages тАУ even Grandma loves beating your Mega Match score
    тАв 20+ tile sets тАУ more on the way so Grams can play with her kitties but you donтАЩt have to
    тАв Fast Games тАУ most levels are completed in under a minute
    тАв Free to Play тАУ we show you a few affiliate offers instead of charging you money
    тАв Play Offline тАУ play in the car or on the airplane!
    тАв Improves Memory тАУ concentration, focus, recall, recognition
    тАв Easy to Play тАУ 5 difficulty levels ensures achievement resolution
    тАв Hard to Play тАУ 5 difficulty levels ensures challenge accuracy
    тАв Learn numbers 1-12 in Spanish тАУ More language learning tiles are planned
    тАв Learn numbers 1-12 in English тАУ More language learning tiles are planned
    тАв Scoreboard тАУ impress your friends, or else take selfies of your new 2x or 3x brain size 
    тАв Full Credits are available from the in-game menu
    тАв 2025 Update Roadmap includes Competition Mode

Install Mega Match now from the Chrome Web Store!
